ing: 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste
des: "This is great for Easter, but we love it anytime! My kids love making and eating 'Bunny Salad', and they have no idea they are voluntarily ingesting veggies. =)"
ins: Stir the carrots, apples, celery, lemon juice, raisins, yogurt, walnuts, and cinnamon together in a mixing bowl until evenly blended. Refrigerate 1 hour before serving.
